Articles.Content:
So, everyone knows the Grand Tour, right? (Visit every single planet, etc.)

What if you had to visit every single planet+ moon and circumnavigate it?

*For Jool and Kerbol, orbiting it is okay

REQUIREMENTS:

1. Mining is allowed

2. Must start on Kerbin (circumnavigate it once before going to orbit and other planets)

3.  The altitude of every circumnavigation must be under 10000m (except for Kerbol+ Jool)

Good luck!
